name: Neon Dark
description:
Race to destroy the light generators. Achieve Neon Dark.

The dystopian 3D platformer Neon Dark was a passion project by me, Matthew (it was also a proof of concept that I could make something). I made everything except the skybox (yes, the music and sound effects, sprites, animations etc.). It was originally going to be a 3rd person survival shooter. But I guess enough of those exist (that and initial technical difficulties got in the way). Anyway, it ended up being a speedrunning first person game where you have a blaster and jetpack, and you have to race around a very vertical level destroying generators to dim the lights. When the lights are black, you win! Hope you enjoy!

Feel free to post your time in the comments (my best so far is 01:11.65).

Best time: DogStylist with 00:59.53
